description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

Chotto Dake Nukechau Hiiragi-san

altTitles.ja: Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: ラブスクライブ！

description.en: "I like what I like!" An encounter between two trendy people and their friendship!

altTitles.ja-ro: Diamond no Kouzai

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!

altTitles.ja-ro: Nise Seijo Kuso of the Year: Risou no Seijo? Zannen, Nise Seijo deshita!

altTitles.ru: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~

altTitles.ja: 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～

description.en:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
description.id:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] adalah sebuah permainan yang tidak cocok untuk di panggil sebagai galge, karena apapun rute yang di pilih heroine utama akan selalu menemui ajalnya.

Fudou Niito, seorang penduduk di jepang, pergi tidur dengan ketidakpuasan pada akhir dari gamenya. Selanjutnya ketika dia terbangun, ia menemukan dirinya berada dalam tubuh seorang saint yang di benci dalam game, Elrise.

Dia kebingungan, namun dengan pemahaman bahwa tindakan Elrise akan menyebabkan bencana untuk banyak kehidupan di masa depan, dia memanfaatkan situasi itu dan bertindak untuk mengubah jalannya sejarah.

Sebagai hasilnya, terlepas dari kepribadian busuknya, Elrise di cintai oleh orang-orang di sekitarnya sebagai seorang saint yang sempurna. Terlebih lagi, game itu sendiri pada intinya terhubung dengan dunia asli tempatnya berada dan berubah berdasarkan tindakan Elrise. Tanpa mengetahui apa yang sedang terjadi, seorang saint palsu Elrise terus-menerus mengubah takdirnya.

Seorang saint di luar, namun pria di dalamnya.

Orang yang merasuki adalah seorang bajingan dan orang yang di rasukinya juga merupakan seorang bajingan. Kombinasi dari para bajingan akan menyebabkan mala petaka yang akan menciptakan pertunjukan saint palsu bajingan terbesar tahun ini!
description.ja:
異世界で無双！　偽聖女で何が悪い…!?
ギャルゲー『永遠の散花』は、どのルートを選んでもメインヒロインが死ぬギャルゲーである。 ゲーム内に登場する悪役へ転生した俺は、ヒロインのエテルナを救うため、ゲーム知識をフル活用しようとするのだが…？
description.ru:
Визуальный роман «Куон но Санка ~Fiore caduto eterna~» — несправедливая игра, где в каждой из веток истории главная героиня умирает. Я, переродившийся в поддельную святую-злодейку игры Эльризе, решил по полной использовать все свои знания об игре, чтобы спасти главную героиню, Этерну, однако…

Внешность святой девы, а внутри мужик. Дерьмовой душе — дерьмовый персонаж. Как же развернётся история, где по случайности два отброса слились воедино?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: Kimitte Watashi no Koto Suki Nandesho?

altTitles.ja: きみって私のこと好きなんでしょ？

altTitles.zh: 你其实是喜欢我的对吧？

description.en:
“Hey Kuroya-kun, do you like me?”
“How did you know!?”

Unrequited love. What a shame for Kuroya, a gloomy student in high school.
The other party is Kasumi Shiramori, a senior in the literature club and a transcendentally beautiful girl. While spending time alone in the club, I should have hidden this feeling for a long time…!
Senior told Kuroya in desperation.

“Then -? Want to try dating me first?”

There’s no way a relationship exists in the minds of these two!? No, wait, it should be like this-
Both the feelings and the super-sweet romantic comedy of youth are full of faintness in the misery of a longing senior who is teased despite being in a relationship!
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/you-like-me-dont-you-so-wanna-go-out-with-me-volume-1)
description.ja: 「きみって私のこと好きなんでしょ？」高校２年生の黒矢総吉は、入学当初より想いを寄せる同じ文芸部の先輩・白森霞から突然そう告げられる。ふいに本心を見抜かれた黒矢は、動揺の末に告白してしまう……するとなぜか”お試し”で付き合うことに!?年上彼女にイジられまくる恥ずかしいのに嬉しい”お試し交際
description.pt-br:
"Ei, Kuroya... você gosta de mim, não é?" 
"O quê-?! Como diabos você sabia?!" 

Kuroya é um cara comum mais ou menos do colégio. Ele estava convencido de que sua paixão estava fora de seu alcance, mas ela acabara de questioná-lo sobre seus verdadeiros sentimentos... Ele agora está prestes a morrer de vergonha! A paixão em questão é Kasumi Shiramori, e ela não apenas é mais velha e a única outra integrante do clube literário, mas também é uma das belezas renomadas da escola! 

"Como ela poderia saber que eu gostava dela?" 

Kuroya pensou consigo mesmo, totalmente lívido. Claro, passamos muito tempo juntos dentro e fora do clube, mas ainda assim! 

"Então... quer sair comigo?" 

Shiramori terminou seu combo duplo com esta proposta chocante. 

"Ela também gosta de mim?! De jeito nenhum! Alguém me belisca!"

Uma das comédias românticas mais completas que existe! Como o nosso casal navegará em seu primeiro relacionamento um com o outro?

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

title.en: The War of Greedy Witches: 32 of the Wickedest Women Duel to the Death

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.en: The Great Witch War: 32 Genius Witches Kill Each Other

description.en:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.ja-ro: Futsuu no Keionbu

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

altTitles.ja-ro: Doku wo Haku

altTitles.ja: 独を白く

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.ja: 私は選ばれない

description.en:
Although her marriage was arranged by her parents, Chloe, the daughter of a count, had deeply loved her fiancé, Ernest, the eldest heir of the Ordrand Marquis family, since childhood. However, she is struck by the shocking reality when Ernest decides to break off their engagement and choose her younger sister, Emily, instead.
Amid the pain of betrayal and heartbreak, Lionel, a young duke from the renowned Cislay family, suddenly appears and proposes marriage to her without any warning.

description.en:
Manga completed with 10 chapters and 2 bonus chapters.

The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today.The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?!After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption.Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection.One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath!The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means!A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

description.en: The hero who holds both the strongest title in magic, “Mage,” and the strongest title in swordsmanship, “Sword Saint,” returns to a world 1000 years after becoming a legendary figure!! Balua Westgarden, the “Magic Sword Saint” who once mastered both magic and swordsmanship and etched his name at the pinnacle of human history, challenged the absolute demon king Giranher in a decisive battle for the survival of humanity. However, due to the interference of mysterious forces, both Balua and Giranher lost their lives. For 1000 years, Balua’s soul was bound to the world by regret for dying halfway through his journey. But when Direa Westgarden, a boy who admired the Magic Sword Saint, was attacked by monsters and left on the brink of death, Balua returned to the mortal world by borrowing his body.

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

After three years of working for a black company, Akira was exhausted both mentally and physically.  
But one morning, what he saw on his usual way to work was nothing but a town full of zombies.   
How will the former company slave, Akira, live his life in a world that has completely changed overnight!?  

---

description.fr:
Après s'être fait exploiter pendant trois ans dans une entreprise, Akira est épuisé mentalement et physiquement. En se rendant à son travail un matin, il découvre une ville pleine de zombies. Comment l'ancien esclave d'entreprise qu'il était appréhendera sa vie dans un monde qui a complètement changé du jour au lendemain ?

description.pt-br: Depois de três anos trabalhando para uma empresa exploradora, Akira estava exausto, tanto mentalmente, quanto fisicamente. Mas uma manhã, o que ele viu no caminho habitual para o trabalho não passava de uma cidade cheia de zumbis. Como o ex-escravo da empresa, Akira, viverá sua vida em um mundo que mudou completamente da noite para o dia?

Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

description.en: Orphan Ah Young is a financially struggling 23-year-old who takes care of her 8-year-old sister Dan Bi while juggling part-time jobs. One day a 28-year-old man Yoo Sang appears in front of Ah Young offering to be her dad through a signed agreement.
description.ko:
웹툰, 웹소설, CJ ENM DIA TV 웹드라마로 즐기는 <서류상 아빠>

23살에 28살짜리 아빠가 생겨 버렸다.

“그쪽만 원하신다면 제가 그쪽 아빠를 할까 합니다만.”

처음엔 신종 사기인가 생각했지만, 8살 동생과 나에겐 아빠가 필요했고, 그는 딸이 필요했다.

그렇게 임시 가족이 되었는데…….

“심장 괜찮아요?”
“심장요?”

겨우 5살 차이의 우리는 부녀라기에 어딘지 좀 이상하다. 

“아까 아영 씨 심장이 마구 뛴다고 했잖아요. 나도 그런데…….”

우리 이대로 괜찮을까?

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

altTitles.es-la: La Santa Inferior de Habilidades Versátiles: ¡Era tan Hábil que no Pudo Escapar de la Pobreza!

altTitles.en: The Incompetent Saint with All-Purpose Skills: Too Handy to Ever Be Poor~

description.en: "So, you're an inferior saint, huh!"                                                                Soara, who received the divine revelation of a saint, was invited to the party of her childhood friend, the hero Zeno. Everyone in the party had S-rank skills and high expectations of her, but she was banished for not having any outstanding talent.  Although shocked, Soara did not lose heart and transitioned into a freelance adventurer. She deepened her bonds with the companions she met during her travels, gradually recovering from the shock of being expelled from the party and achieving success along the way—but—?
description.ja:
「お前が劣等聖女だったとはな！」

聖女の天啓を受けたソアラは、全員がSランクスキル持ちであり幼なじみの勇者ゼノンのパーティに期待されて誘われたものの、飛び抜けた才能がなかったため追放されてしまう。ショックを受けつつも、ソアラはめげずにフリーの冒険者へ転身し、旅先で出会った仲間たちと親交を深めて、少しずつパーティ追放のショックから立ち直って活躍していくのだが――？
description.es-la: ¡Nunca supe que eras una santa inferior! Soara, quien recibió la revelación de ser una santa, fue invitada a unirse al grupo del héroe con grandes expectativas, pero fue expulsada por ser una persona que sabía un poco de todo pero no dominaba ninguna habilidad en particular. Aunque sorprendida, Soara no se rinde y se convierte en una aventurera independiente. Profundiza sus amistades con Lumia, quien la apoya como su administradora, y con las habilidosas aventureras Elaine y Laura, a quienes conoce en sus viajes. Poco a poco, Soara se recupera del impacto de haber sido expulsada del grupo y comienza a tener éxito, pero... ¡Las chicas hermosas que enfrentan diversas dificultades están en acción! ¡La fantasía de las chicas de otro mundo que comienza con la expulsión empieza aquí!

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

description.ru:
Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. Она использует информацию из книги, которую она проанализировала в своей настоящей жизни, чтобы избежать смерти и найти правду о том, что же случилось с ней на самом деле.

description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

Ana karakterimiz başarısız bir romantik fantezi romanı yazarıydı ve bir vur-kaç olayından sonra, çok satan bir dövüş sanatları romanındaki kötü adam olarak uyandı. Orijinal hayatında analiz ettiği romandan gelen bilgileri, ölümünü önlemek ve başına gerçekten ne geldiğinin arkasındaki gerçeği bulmak için kullanır.

description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

altTitles.ja: キングゴルフ
高球王

description.en:
In Teirin High School, you are either part of a gang or an elite sports player. Sousuke Youki, called 'the predator,' is an undefeated master at fighting. One morning, as he finishes up a fight, Kazumi, a prodigy amateur golf player, took a look at Sousuke, ignored him, and walked right by. Infuriated, Sousuke sets out to get revenge on Kazumi for dissing him but Sousuke's revenge takes a detour as he gets himself involved in playing golf by the thuggish golf coach. Will this delinquent break legends and become "the King of Golf"?  
  
King Golf also won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award in January 2010 in the boys category.

title.en: Hero x Demon King x Villain

altTitles.es-la: Héroes y Reyes, Demonios y Villanos

description.en:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
description.ko:
신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.
악의 조직을 전전하는 숙련된 삼류 ‘악당’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와
내 편안한 은퇴 생활을 망치고 있다!

악당을 가호하는 아흔아홉 악마시여….
신의 축복이나 받고 뒈지소서!

altTitles.en: It's Voice Phishing, but It's a Life Reversal
Voice Phishing Turns Your Life Around

title.en: How Did a Pro Player Like Me End Up as a Max-Level Priestess in Another World?

altTitles.zh: 满级穿越的我为什么是牧师小姐啊

altTitles.en: Why Am I a Max-Level Priestess After Crossing into Another World?
I Am a Max-level Priestess in Another World

description.en: A pro player suddenly finds himself transported into a game, inhabiting their own max-level priestess character. Now, he teams up with a dragon-maid girl, embarking on a journey in a different world! But wait... Why are all these ladies looking at her so strangely?

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.
